issue.title: [WIP - experimental/POC] router - add QueryCtx to avoid query collision
issue.body:
This allows the `GetTablesByDatabaseAndSchema` route to use on query only the requested DB, avoiding multiple requests collision. By this we:

1. extends current interface, allowing usage of current one
2. doesnt break old users
3. allow setting custom query timeouts

todo:
1. make usage of DB pool a standard
2. test more

comment.body:
SourceLevel has finished reviewing this Pull Request and has found:

* 5 possible new issues (including those that may have been commented here).

But beware that this branch is **[1 commit behind the `prest:main` branch](https://github.com/prest/prest/compare/arxdsilva:context...prest:main)**, and a review of an up to date branch would produce more accurate results.

<!-- SourceLevel auto generated comment -->

comment.diff_hunk:
@@ -95,7 +97,16 @@ func GetTablesByDatabaseAndSchema(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) {
 	valuesAux := make([]interface{}, 0)
 	valuesAux = append(valuesAux, database, schema)
 	valuesAux = append(valuesAux, values...)
-	sc := config.PrestConf.Adapter.Query(sqlSchemaTables, valuesAux...)
+
+	// set db name on ctx
+	ctx := context.WithValue(r.Context(), "db_name", database)
comment.body: should not use basic type string as key in context.WithValue
